item.title: Monto Version 3 Specification, Draft 3
item.description: Draft 4 TODOs Design, Document, Implement Configuration Client Protocol global config in broker, stateful and persisted per-client stateless config Service Protocol stateless Abstract This specification describes an improved iteration of the Monto protocol for Disintegrated Development Environments ([MONTO-2014][MONTO-2016]) . These improvements allow for simpler implementations for Clients. They also make it feasible to have multiple Clients sharing a single Service, and for Services to be operated over the Internet (rather than on the local network or on a single machine).
